p.em: Special Board meeting. This meeting will not have a public forum.

div.p: Due to the shut down of all K-12 schools this board meeting will be held remotely. You may still attend the board meeting virtually by entering the Zoom link at the time of the board meeting to watch the meeting in real time and/or participate in the public forum. The video conference will be recorded and uploaded to the website to be accessed at anytime following the meeting.
We will still hold a public forum during the board meeting in the following ways:

li.p: Video call - You may join the board meeting via a Zoom link

div.p: The Mastery School has created a Distance Learning Plan for the Spring of 2020. This plan outlines how the school will respond to Minnesota’s mandate for all K-12 schools to close due to COVID-19 (coronavirus).

p.a: Please click here to view the plan.

div.class:
summary-item summary-item-record-type-text sqs-gallery-design-list-slide
summary-item-has-thumbnail summary-item-has-excerpt
summary-item-has-author

div.p: Governor Tim Walz has ordered all K-12 schools in Minnesota to stay closed until at least May 4, 2020.

li.p: The Mastery School Distance Learning Plan will go into effect on Monday, March 30, 2020.

Technology devices, Food Boxes, and your child’s belongings will be delivered to your homes on Monday, March 30, 2020. Watch for a communication from 4Mativ Transportation for details about the delivery.
If you need assistance, please contact Mr. Rask at mrask@themasteryschool.org or 612-239-9776.

div.p:
In partnership,
Emily Peterson
Executive Director

div.h1:
In relentless pursuit of excellence,
we teach our scholars mastery over their academics, self, and future.
div.p: The Mastery School is a K-6 school that will be adding 7th grade for the 2019-2020 school year. Mastery was founded on the belief that “all of our children can excel if given the time and support that they need.”

Small class sizes
Single gender classes (K-2)
Focus on African American history and culture
Northside Achievement Zone Anchor School
Reading Core Total Learning Classroom model

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Find out about our gap-closing approach to education. We don't just beat the odds, we've raised the bar!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Our excellent teachers affirm, nurture, and challenge our scholars to reach their full potential. Many of our teachers attended Harvest Network schools, earned their college degrees, and came back to make a difference.

div.span: The Mastery School, 4021 Thomas Avenue North, Minneapolis, MN 55412
